body:
### Welcome to iCagenda GitHub Page. There you will be able to edit the language files, and send me directly the info: * CZECH (cs-CZ) * DUTCH (nl-NL) * [ENGLISH (en-GB)](https://github.com/JoomliC/iCagenda-Translations/tree/master/en-GB) * [FRENCH (fr-FR)](https://github.com/JoomliC/iCagenda-Translations/tree/master/fr-FR) * GERMAN (de-DE) * [GREEK (el-GR)](https://github.com/JoomliC/iCagenda-Translations/tree/master/el-GR) * [ITALIAN (it-IT)](https://github.com/JoomliC/iCagenda-Translations/tree/master/it-IT) * LATVIAN (lv-LV) * NORWEGIAN (nb-NO) * [PORTUGUESE / BRAZIL (pt-BR)](https://github.com/JoomliC/iCagenda-Translations/tree/master/pt-BR) * RUSSIAN (ru-RU) * SLOVAK (sk-SK) * SPANISH (es-ES) Now, we have 13 languages available for iCagenda. ### ## v1.2.6 String of Translation Added _(Have a look in en-GB files, as example)_ *** **ADMIN >** xx-XX.com_icagenda.ini ``` ; Panel (lines 199-200 in en-GB) COM_ICAGENDA_FEATURES_BACKEND = "Back-End : Category management, creation of events, registration management, newsletter..." COM_ICAGENDA_FEATURES_FRONTEND = "Front-End : Register for events, sharing on social networks, GoogleMaps, choice of templates..." ; Panel (lines 212-215 in en-GB) COM_ICAGENDA_INFO = "Info" COM_ICAGENDA_NEWS = "Minimum Config.
& News" COM_ICAGENDA_DONATE = "Donate via PayPal" COM_ICAGENDA_TRANSLATOR = "Translator" ``` **Note: COM_ICAGENDA_NEWS must be short, as in an icon button** *** **ADMIN >** xx-XX.com_icagenda.sys.ini ``` ;iCagenda (line 43 in en-GB) COM_ICAGENDA_INFO = "Info" ``` *** ### Authors and Contributors Owner of the project: @JoomliC. Translators: Bong (cs-CZ), Roland John van Wanrooy (nl-NL), Lyr!C (en-GB & fr-FR), BMB (de-DE), Giusebos (it-IT), Rikard TÃ¸mte Reitan (nb-NO), Corasouza (pt-BR), MSV (ru-RU), elerizo (es-ES), JRIBARSZKI (sk-SK), kredo9 (lv-LV), E.Gkana-D.Kontogeorgis (el-GR) ### Want to propose packs for a language not listed here? Please contact @JoomliC Translation Coordination ### Support or Contact Contact @JoomliC. [www.joomlic.com](http://www.joomlic.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: iCagenda
